title: Ren'ai Maker 2
description:
This is my very first torrent, and I&#039;m not sure I&#039;m doing it right, but after a few PM&#039;s and requests I have decided to try to seed this little gem.

What is it?
A "game-maker". Make your own love-sim&#039;s, it comes with plenty of free-to-use resources.

Currently, it is in japanese, and I&#039;m hoping for somebody to translate it, if we get a good translation we may be able to see many home-made love-sims or even h-games since it can do that too.

I remember having to use applocale to get this thing working, but it was a long time ago...

Pics and more available at hongfire.com
